name: Leave the Kids Alone
description:
The story of this game is inspired by our true memories and many other school girls in Iran.

This is a point-and-click game in which you experience a day in the life of a student girl in Iran.

Schools in Iran are divided by gender, and you should wear a specific uniform to go to school. They force kids to chant hateful statements every morning. You can't wear any makeup in school. They scare kids of God and hell. They check their bags without their permission. If you want to know more about the situation, just play the game.

(There is still more going on in Iran's schools, and we couldn't cover them all in our game.)
